root.description: Story summeryIn the 24th century the world is ravaged by nukes that where dropped during world war 3 and remaining settlements on the brink of collapse because of political strife. After the breakthrough of space travel humanity was able to settle on other planets. After decades of colonization humanity encountered first contact with intelligent life the alien race was found to be parasitic and able to take control over the host and took over human bodies to further venture into space to expand its reach.
